Description:
Best Seller Ranking: #2 in

Model
Brand: Phanteks
Series: Eclipse G300A
Model: PH-EC300GA_DBK01


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Steel Chassis / Tempered Glass
Motherboard Compatibility: Micro ATX / ATX / Mini-ITX
Side Panel Window: Yes, Tempered Glass


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 1
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 3
Expansion Slots: 7; Vertical GPU support with optional bracket PH-VGPUKT4.0_03R


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 1x USB 3.0 Type A, 1x USB 3.0 Type C, Microphone/Headphone Combo, Power Button, Reset Button


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front - 3 x 120mm 
Rear - 1 x 120mm (1x pre-installed) 
Top - 2 x 120mm
Radiator Options: Front - Up to 360mm / Rear - Up to 120mm / Top - Up to 240mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 390 mm (without front fans)
Max CPU Cooler Height: 162 mm
Max PSU Length: 220 mm (with HDD installed)
Dimensions (H x W x D): 20.2 x 11 x 18.9 in
Weight: 12.26 lbs


Additional Info
Features: Small in size and big on features, the Phanteks Eclipse G300A brings high airflow performance in a compact ATX chassis. Large GPUs, like the ASUS RTX4090 STRIX, fit perfectly with front fans installed and even high-end CPUs can be cooled easily with front 360 or top 240 radiator support.

The G300A comes equipped with a rear 120mm D-RGB fan and a D-RGB Motherboard Adapter to connect it directly to a motherboard
Label: Chasis Phanteks Eclipse G300A Mesh D-RGB Black
